summary: Alex Chen is a 28-year-old software engineer who prefers to be called Alex and uses they/them pronouns.
Alex lives in San Francisco, California and works remotely for a tech startup.
Alex prefers casual, friendly communication style and appreciates when people use their correct pronouns.
Alex is learning Spanish and wants to become conversational within the next year.
Alex is passionate about sustainability and tries to live a low-waste lifestyle.
Alex has a monthly budget of $3,500 and is saving for a down payment on a house.
Alex enjoys hiking, reading science fiction novels, and experimenting with plant-based cooking.
Alex has a cat named Luna who is 3 years old and very playful.
Alex is allergic to peanuts and always carries an semPen.
Alex wants to start investing in index funds and learn more about personal finance.
Alex prefers to work in the morning hours and is most productive between 8 AM and 12 PM.
Alex is planning to visit Japan in the fall and wants to learn basic Japanese phrases.
Alex had a great conversation about sustainable living with their neighbor Sarah yesterday.
Alex completed a 5-mile hike in Golden Gate Park this morning and saw beautiful wildflowers.
Alex tried a new vegan ramen recipe tonight and it turned out delicious.
Alex had a productive meeting with their team about the new project architecture.
Alex spent 30 minutes practicing Spanish with a language learning app.
Alex received a $500 bonus at work today for completing a project ahead of schedule.
Alex had dinner with their friend Mike and discussed starting a book club.
Alex's cat Luna knocked over a plant this morning, but no damage was done.
Alex found a great deal on hiking boots and saved $80 on their purchase.
Alex had a video call with their parents and discussed holiday plans.
